As a permanent-event, attacks against minion and overt companies keyed to these regions or at sites therein are never detainment. Any company moving in these regions faces an Elf attack of 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against hero companies). You may return this card to your hand, which counts as 1 against the hazard limit.
Any character playing or using a resource that requires a skill or race must make a CC modified by -1 (-2 if he is a Noldo). Cannot be duplicated.

All creature attacks keyed to Wilderness [w] or Jungle [j] receive -1 prowess. All Animal, Spider, and Awakened Plant attacks receive +1 prowess (+2 prowess if not at a site). Discard if an Animal, Spider, or Awakened Plant attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

Playable on a non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Wilderness [w]. May also be played on an oasis. The site gains an additional automatic-attack: Awakened Plant -- 1 strike with 10 prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a site.

Environment. Playable on a moving company with more Wilderness [w] and/or Jungle [j] regions in their site path than there are avatars, rangers, and/or Maia and Ent allies in the company. The defending player must replace their new site with a site from his location deck in the same or an adjacent region. If none is available, the hazard player may take a site (which opponent can use) from his location decks instead.

Unique. Elves. Manifestations of Elladan and Elrohir. Detainment against hero companies. Playable keyed to Rhudaur and its adjacent regions; and at sites in these regions if the company contains a leader or a Ringwraith. May also be played against a company that has faced Elves upon Errantry this turn. If any strike wounds a character, the company must immediately discard one item (defender's choice). As a short-event, target and cancel an effect that would cancel an attack or strike from an Elf hazard creature.

Discards and prevents the play of Alliance of Free Peoples and of any Elf-friend played on a Dwarf or Dwarf-friend played on an Elf. Additionally, Elf-lords must use minion site cards for Dwarf-holds; Dwarf-lords must use minion site cards for Elf-holds. Companies with an Elf-lord may attack any company that contains a Dwarf and no Elf or Wizard; companies with a Dwarf-lord may attack any company that contains an Elf and no Dwarf or Wizard. Once per their turn, any player may tap an Elf and a Dwarf to make a roll; if the result is greater than 8, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated.

Unique. Maia. Manifestation of Tom Bombadil. Detainment and -3 prowess against hero and non-Ringwraith covert companies. May be played keyed to Old Forest; and at sites in this region. May also be played at Barrow-downs. The attack and its strikes cannot be cancelled by ring-effects. As a permanent-event, no overt or minion company may move to a site in Old Forest. You may return The Oldest to your hand, which counts as one against the hazard limit.

Each player may take one Maia hazard permanent-event from his discard pile and shuffle it into his play deck during the end-of-turn phase. Additionally, if Doors of Night is not in play, hazard creatures that are manifestations of an Elf-lord or Wizard may be played keyed to Wilderness [w], Border-land [b], or Border-hold [B] against minion and overt companies; and also at Ruins & Lairs [R] if such a company contains a ring. Cannot be duplicated.

Awakened Plant. One strike. Detainment against companies with a Wizard (not a Fallen-wizard), Elf, or Hobbit. May also be played following an attack from a unique Awakened Plant creature this phase, or at a site with Nature's Revenge. Unless the attack was cancelled or defeated, the hazard player may reveal the top 10 cards of his play deck: one revealed Awakened Plant creature (your choice) immediately attacks the company (shuffle rest back into the play deck).
All Awakened Plant attacks receive +1 strike and attacker chooses defending characters. Cannot be duplicated.
All Awakened Plant attacks with body have their body modified by +1. All Awakened Plant attacks with no body have 4 body. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.
Arthedain, Cardolan, The Shire
Dorwinion, Harrhun, Forrhun, Sea of Rhun

Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take Far-sight, Moon-runes, Test of Lore, or Wisdom to Wield from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Playable during the site phase at Barad-dur on an Elf or Dunadan with a mind of five or more. Tap character. The company faces attacks: Orcs -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess; Trolls -- 2 strikes with 10 prowess. This card comes into play inverted; it may be stored at any Elf-hold. While inverted, target character may not untap. Re-invert it if he is at an Elf-hold or uses (for no effect) a card with a healing effect. This card gives full MP to a Lord-player. Discard during the organization phase at an Elf-hold to  bring Prisoner from Ost-in-Edhil into play as a hero character; he may be taken from your hand, discard pile, or sideboard.

Lady Galadriel specific. Playable on Galadriel if she is at Lorien and bears The One Ring. Only one A Lady Rules upon Arda may be played per turn. Make a roll during each of your end-of-turn phases if Galadriel bears The One Ring and she is untapped and at Lorien. Add 1 for each A Lady Rules upon Arda you have in play. If the result is less than 6, Galadriel is eliminated. If the result is greater than 9, you win the game.

Playable on Gandalf, Radagast, or an Elf-lord. If in his company, Treebeard and Tom Bombadil are not discarded as per their card text when moving to Tom's House or Wellinghall. If both these allies are in his company, you may place them "off to the side"with this card. You may then tap both (at any time) to either: *Make Awakened Plant creatures playable at your avatar's current site against minion companies this turn; * Give +2 to a ring test, or cancel Rolled Down to the Sea played earlier in the same chain of effects; * Store Into the Smoking Cone or Fate of the Ithil Stone at Mount Doom or Barad-dur (as if at a Haven [H]); * Take Cracks of Doom or The Old Thrush from your discard pile to hand.

Unique. Playable on Cirdan if he is at Grey Havens. If Reconstructed Towers is in play, Palantir of Elostirion is not discarded as per its card text when its bearer moves from The White Towers to Grey Havens (or vice versa). Additionally, if you are Cirdan you may play A New Ringlord; The White Towers must be used (regardless of its site type) to fulfill the site requirement for the roll.

Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Playable on an untapped Galadriel at Lorien if The One Ring is also at Lorien. Tap Galadriel and the bearer of The One Ring (if untapped); both make a CC modified by -4. If both are still in play afterwards, Galadriel may now bear The One Ring and she immediately takes control of it. +1 to her CC.

Playable only on Elrond Half-elven or Thranduil of Mirkwood, if he is at his home site and bears The One Ring. May also be played during the site phase. If your avatar bears The One Ring, he makes a CC during each of his end-of-turn phases for each hero character with a mind of 8 or more at his site (10 for a Wizard). If still in play afterwards, make a roll and add 1 for each hero character with a mind of 8 or more at his site: if the result is less than 6, he is eliminated; if the result is greater than 10, you win the game.

Playable on an Elf with a mind of six or more (five or more if Noldo or Sinda) at a Haven [H]. When a Lost Knowledge card is required to be discarded from target Elf's company (or a Stolen Knowledge card if he is a scout or ranger), you may discard this card instead.

Playable on an Elf with a mind of 8 or more (7 or more if a Noldo) at a Haven [H]. Target Elf may use spells as if he were a Wizard. He may not use Sacrifice of Form. If he is Glorfindel, he may play Sacrifice of Form against a Nazgul or Spawn attack; keep this card with Sacrifice of Form and place both on Glorfindel when he enters play.

Unique. Weapon.  +2 DI against Dunedain and Sinda Elves. If bearer is a Dunadan or Sinda, this item gives 3 corruption points. Each Dunadan in the company is considered an Elf for the purpose of The Evenstar. Warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 12) and -2 to target's body. TAP: if The Evenstar has been played this turn to untap a Dunadan or Sinda in the company facing a strike. Bearer makes a CC modified by +2.

Unique. Cirdan the Shipwright specific. Whenever a battle-gear item is stored at Grey Havens, it must be placed with this card, and you may take one non-unique battle-gear item from your sideboard and place it with this card. Any item placed with Arsenal of Lindon is considered "off to the side": it gives no MP and may be played as if from hand. This card gives 2 MP if there is an opponent's item placed with it.

Ritual. Sage only. Playable during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. Tap the sage, place this card on a non-unique weapon item in the company, and choose a type: Drake,Giant, Orc, Troll, Spider, Wolf, or Undead. The weapon gives +2 prowess or -1 to target's body (decide during the strike sequence) against strikes of the chosen type. Sage makes a CC modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

Playable on a Noble Hound controlled by an Elf or a non-overt ranger. +1 body for the Noble Hound; it is considered an Elf for the purpose of cards that modify prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a Noble Hound. TAP: allow target Noble Hound to face any number of strikes from an attack for which you assign strikes, in separate strike sequences.

Bow. A given character may bear only one Bow of Yew. Cannot be used by a Hobbit. Warrior only: TAP: modify one strike from a hazard creature attack (or any attack if bearer is Bard Bowman or a Nando or Silvan Elf) another character in the company is facing by -2 to its prowess and body; this modification is only to prowess if another Bow of Yew was tapped against the same strike.

Unique. Playable on Glorfindel. Glorfindel becomes a leader. He receives +1 prowess against Dragons, Nazgul, and Spawn; the body of such strikes against him is modified by -1. Discard if Glorfindel is in a company without avatar and moves to a site that has no automatic- attack and is not in Eriador. TAP: during the end-of-turn phase to take Power Against the Shadow from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Playable on Fanar. +1 DI against Elves. He requires 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Galadriel or GI. If he is the highest mind Elf in the company, Fanar becomes a leader; you choose defending unwounded characters for attacks against his company that do not choose defending characters (or during CvCC at a site in a Wilderness [w]). Discard if Fanar is in a company without avatar and moves to a site that is not in Wold & Foothills or its adjacent regions.

Playable on Arwen, Elladan, or Elrohir. Tap target character if untapped. +1 to his mind and +1 DI against Dunedain. He is also considered a Dunadan; he requires 3 points of influence to control if controlled by a Dunadan. The Burden of Time cannot be played on him. Cannot be duplicated on a character.

Trophy. Playable during the site phase on a company at a non-Haven site in Mirkwood (not in Woodland Realm), if Towers Destroyed is rotated at least once. The company faces 2 of the following attacks (opponent's choice; cannot be cancelled): Spiders -- 5 strikes with 7 prowess; Orcs -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Trolls 2 -- strikes with 9 prowess. Demon -- 1 strike with 11 prowess. Afterwards, tap a character at the site or discard this card. Store it when the company is at a Haven [H] or at a Free-hold [F] in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions. If stored, it gives 2 MP and attacks of the above named types against hero companies at or moving to a site in Mirkwood receive -1 to their prowess and strikes (to minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated at a site.

Discard if not borne by a Wizard or an Elf sage with a mind of seven or more. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. TAP: gain one of the following abilities this turn: * if at a Haven [H], bearer may join any of your companies facing a creature attack; he must face a strike of the attack. * bearer may tap to test a gold ring in his company; * your hand size is increased by one; * you may draw one additional card for each Wilderness [w] region in the company's site path; * tap bearer during the end-of-turn phase to take a spell or ritual from your discard pile to your hand. Bearer makes a CC.

Elf-lord or Dunadan-lord only. Discard if you have 12 SP or more. You may play Dunadan and Elf characters with up to a 7 mind (even in your starting company). Your Elf and Dunadan characters and factions are each worth full MP. When your Dunadan character taps to support an Elf in his company (or vice versa), he gives +2 to the CC or prowess (instead of +1). Discard to bring one Elf or Dunadan character into play during the organization phase at your Lordhaven [H]; he must have a home site in the same territory as the Lordhaven (or in an adjacent region).

Unique. Staff. Can only be used by a Wizard or an Elf-lord. +1 DI. +1 prowess (+3 against magic-users). You may place a spell from hand with this item: bearer makes a CC modified by -2. Only one spell may be with this item at any given time. Any spell placed with Crisfuin may be played as if from hand; ignore the spell's CC when you play it. TAP: at any time to cancel all effects from magic or spell resources used by a non-avatar character at the same site and with a mind lower than bearer's this turn.

Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. When you play Nenya and Galadriel is at or moving to a Dark-hold [D], Shadow-hold [S], or Ruins & Lairs [R] in Wilderland or its adjacent regions, place a token on that site; you may place that site with this card instead of discarding it from play. If placed with this card, all versions of the site become a Ruins & Lairs and its region becomes a Wilderness [w]. This card gives 1 MP for each site placed with it (to maximum of 4). A minion player may discard a site placed with this card during the site phase at the corresponding minion version, if his company there: plays a magic resource, discards a technology item, or taps an avatar.

Unique. Lesser Ring. Playable at Osteledan or Telpemar if the company discards a Lost Knowledge card it controls. +1 to bearer's mind and DI. -1 to his body. All his CC are modified by  +1 for each hero environment resource in play. TAP: take Echo of All Joy or The Evenstar from your discard pile to your hand. Bearer makes a CC.

Playable on a character at an Elf-hold (not an Elf, Wizard, Ringwraith, or overt character). Target character receives +2 DI against Elves. He suffers no negative modifications due to his race when attempting to influence Elf factions. He is also considered an Elf for the purpose of non-environment, non-item cards and effects. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Playable on Aeglin, Aiglos, Angrist, Anguirel, Anglachel, Glamdring, Kirrauko, Orcrist, Ringil, Sting, Sulhelka, Sword of Gondolin, or Ungolcrist. Any Biter and Beater! played on the company also affects this item. Cannot be duplicated on a given item. TAP: give an Orc, Troll, or Undead attack -1 to its strikes (to a minimum of 1). Bearer makes a CC.

Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company containing an Elf bearing Elven Rope. Name a region (not a Coastal Sea [c], Dark-domain [d], or region with two or more symbols). This region (both its type and name) is not considered in the company's site path for the purpose of hazards.

Unique. Playable at Edhellond, if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+2), Elves (+2), characters with Edhellond as a home site (+2). If Cirdor is at Edhellond, you may play Sail to the West on characters there as if they were at Grey Havens. This faction gives 2 MP if Earcaraxe is not in active play.

Unique. Playable at Lorien, if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (-2), Elves (+2), characters with Lorien as a home site (+2). This faction gives 2 MP if Balrog of Moria is not in active play.

Unique. Playable at Rhubar or any Refuge site in Taur Romen, if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+1), Elves (+2), Dwarves (-3), Men (-2) -- apply once for each given race in the company.  TAP: at any time to make Galadhrim playable that turn keyed to any Refuge site in play, or to the Wilderness [w] region containing it.

Unique. Playable at Rivendell, if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+2), Elves (+2), characters with Rivendell as a home site (+2). This faction gives 2 MP if Rogrog or Witch-king of Angmar is in active play.

Unique. Playable if Clean the Greenwood or Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur is in play. Each of your unique factions in play at sites in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions may tap to give -1 (to a minimum of 1) to the prowess and strikes of a rescue-attack or attack from Rescue Prisoners one of your companies faces at a site in Mirkwood. Additionally, if you receive MP for Profitable Trade with any factions played in Wilderland, Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s] and CvCC is not cancelled by Dol Guldur's site card effect. Automatic-attacks at minion Free-holds [F] and Border-holds [B] in Mirkwood receive +2 prowess and cannot be cancelled.

Lost Knowledge. Playable at Ost-in-Edhil, Amon Lind, or Osteledan. If bearer is a sage or an Elf with a mind of five or more and is at a Haven [H], he may tap and replace this item with a Lesser Ring or Magic Ring, which may be taken from your hand, sideboard, or discard pile: place this card in your sideboard.

Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. You may bring Dunadan characters normally playable by Elrond into play at Rivendell (or at any of your Lordhavens [H] if they are a ranger). If this is a starting stage card, such characters may be in your starting company; you must start the game at Rivendell. Place this card on Elrond if he is in  play. He gains +3 DI against Dunedain, and your Dunadan characters and factions are each worth full MP.

Unique. Weapon. Playable on Bow of the Galadhrim if borne by Fanar or Legolas. Bow of the Galadhrim gives its bearer +2 prowess (to a maximum of 9). Additionally, you may tap it (at any time) to modify a strike another character in his company is facing by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body. Discard if not borne by Fanar or Legolas.

Weapon. Bow. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (a maximum of 9 if borne by a Nando or Silvan Elf). Cannot be used by a Hobbit. TAP: allow bearer to remain untapped against a strike from an attack keyed to a region, which does not choose defending characters.

Playable on Legolas or Gimli, if both are in the company that has just defeated an attack. Tap Legolas and Gimli if untapped. If both are in the same company: +1 to their body, and either character may tap to give +3 to any one roll made by/for the other. If either is controlled by the other, he costs 3 points of influence to control. Discard if either character leaves play, or (if you so choose, at any time) to let either take a strike assigned to the other, to cancel an influence attempt against either, or cancel a hazard that would remove either from the company (before it resolves). Cannot be duplicated.

Information. Playable on a character after the successful play of a faction at a site in Mirkwood. Tap the character. Discard to take one character, faction, or ally playable at a site in Mirkwood from your discard pile to your hand. Alternatively, discard (in any turn) when CvCC is declared at a site in Mirkwood to give all characters in the company +1 prowess that turn and untap all unwounded characters. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Unique. Playable if you tap an Elf sage or discard a Lost Knowledge card from play. Any roll for testing a gold ring at a site in Hollin is modified by +1. Additionally, any Elf or Dwarf sage may tap to make non-unique ore resources that are playable at any Under-deeps site playable at his site in Hollin this turn. When this card is discarded, you may take a Ringlore, Secrets of Their Forging, or Knowledge of Their Making from the discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Environment. Cancels the effects of Drowning Seas, Storms of Osse, and Winds of Wrath. Additionally, if Gates of Morning is in play, any hero Elf or Dunadan may tap to give -2 prowess or -1 body to a hazard creature attack against his company keyed (by type or name) to a Coastal Sea [c] region or site therein.

Song. Playable on an Elf if a character or ally in his company is wounded. Target Elf makes a CC, modified by -1 for every environment hazard in play and by +1 for every environment hero resource in play. Your next turn, at the beginning of the same phase in which this card was played, discard this card and you may heal an Elf in the company (or any one character or ally if target Elf is Nando or Silvan) from wounded to tapped.

Playable if you are Alatar, Gandalf, Radagast, or an Elf-lord. You may only bring Elf, Hobbit, Wizard, and Wose characters into play; discard any characters you have in play not of these races. If you have more Wose characters and/or Animal, Ent, Wolf, and Wose allies and factions in play than your opponents, these are each worth full MP. Additionally, each of your Animal, Ent, Wolf, and Wose characters and allies may tap to cancel an attack of their corresponding race/type against the company (Awakened Plant for Ents). Discard when you defeat an attack of these types.

Unique. Cirdan the Shipwright specific. Place this card in your MP. Whenever Cirdan's company defeats an attack from a hazard creature keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region or site therein (by type or name), or from a manifestation of Earcaraxe or Gondring, place the defeated creature (or event) with this card. If there are 3 or more hazards placed with this card (or any one unique hazard), it gives MP equal to the combined MP of the cards placed with it (to a maximum of 5).

Unique. Elf. Noldo. Playable at any Dark-hold [D] if you discard (for no other effect) a Stolen Knowledge card from the company. After Kheleglin comes into play, wound him. TAP: if at a Haven [H] and discard a Reforging from the company (or from your MP) to search your discard pile or sideboard for a Noldo Lantern and place it with a character in the company (you need not tap the character nor the site).

Unique. Cirdan the Shipwright specific. Playable on Cirdor, Galdor, or Tharudan. Target character receives +1 DI. He requires 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Cirdan or GI.  He may tap to cancel a detainment attack against his company. If he is the highest mind Elf in the company, he becomes a leader.

Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on a lone scout, if his company has faced an attack by Gandalf the White Rider this turn or if an opponent's company containing Gandalf is at the same site (or containing Cirdan if Realm of Narya is in play). Tap the scout. May be stored at Barad-dur or a Darkhaven [K]; if stored, Gandalf and/or Cirdan receive -1 to their CC. The first stored Knowledge of Narya gives 4 MP.

Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on an Elf in a covert company, if they have faced an attack from Lady of the Golden Wood this turn; or if an opponent's Galadriel is at the same site (or at Lorien if she is not in play). The Elf faces an attack alone: Elf -- 1 strike with 12 prowess (detainment; attack nor strike can be cancelled). If the strike is successful, he is taken prisoner at Lorien (rescue-attacks: duplicate of the site's automatic-attacks). Otherwise, tap the Elf or discard this card. May be stored at a Darkhaven [K] or Barad-dur; if stored, all characters with Lorien as a home site receive +1 to their mind. The first stored Knowledge of Nenya gives 4 MP.

Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on an Elf in a covert company, if they have faced an attack from Master of the House this turn; or if an opponent's Elrond is at the same site (or at Rivendell if he is not in play). The Elf faces an attack alone: Elf -- 1 strike with 13 prowess (detainment; attack nor strike can be cancelled). If the strike is successful, he is taken prisoner at Rivendell (rescue-attacks: duplicate of the site's automatic-attacks). Otherwise, tap the Elf or discard this card. May be stored at a Darkhaven [K] or Barad-dur; if stored, characters with Rivendell as a home site receive +1 to their mind. The first stored Knowledge of Vilya gives 4 MP.

Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. TAP: during the organization phase to take Phial of Galadriel, Three Golden Hairs, or an item only playable at Lorien from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take Elf-song, Healing Song, or Song of the Lady from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. During the untap phase, this card does not untap normally; instead, tap Galadriel to untap it. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take Mirror of Galadriel, Soul-piercing, or Show Things Unbidden from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Playable on Thranduil if you have in play at least: 7 SP, The King's Hunting, and 4 warriors in Thranduil's company. Discard if these conditions do not exist. Thranduil is considered Alatar for the purpose of Join the Hunt and The Hunt. Invert this card when Thranduil defeats a creature using The Hunt: he is considered Alatar for the purpose of The Great Hunt. TAP: during the end-of-turn-phase to take The Hunt from your discard pile to your hand.

Playable on a sage at Rivendell (or in your starting company if you are Elrond or Gandalf). Target sage may use spirit-magic. He may tap to discard from play one Memories Grown Dim or No Memory of This Place. Additionally, when you play Praise to Elbereth you may immediately attempt to remove one corruption card from a character in the company (as if during the organization phase and with +2 to the roll).

Unique. Playable on Galadriel. You may now bring Lady of the Golden Wood into play from your hand, discard pile, or sideboard (overriding any conflicting rules). Discard Lady of the Golden Wood if Galadriel is not at Lorien. Additionally, if you are Galadriel, this card gives 1 SP and Galadriel may use True Fana as if she were a Wizard; for the purpose of True Fana her prowess is modified by +2 (+4 if Nenya was played that turn).

Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. Playable if Fosterhome of Royal Heirs is in play. Strider and Aragorn gain Rivendell as a  home site. You may bring Strider into play  under Elrond's DI. Place this card on Strider when he enters play. You may bring Aragorn II into play with Strider's company. Aragorn and Strider may only be controlled by Arwen, Elrond, or GI.

Playable on a company with three or more characters of which the majority is Elf. Discard if these conditions do not exist or when any play deck is exhausted. Any Elf or Wizard in the company may tap to untap an Elf or Wizard in the company with an equal or lower mind (except when resolving strikes).

Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Playable if you have 4 SP or more. Place this card in your MP. +2 to your GI. Each of your Animal factions played at sites in Woodland Realm or its adjacent regions may be placed with this card (only one such faction per given site). Each faction placed with this card is worth 2 MP. This card gives 2 MP if you have at least three different factions placed with it.

Unique. Mind Ring. Playable at Barad-dur or Dol Guldur by an Elf with mind 7 or more. May also be played with Celedhring in a starting company in lieu of a minor item. +1 body. -1 to mind (to a minimum of 1). You may play and use Mithril and Vein of Arda as minion resources. Minion sage only: TAP: if at a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] to store or discard Dark Forges (as if at a Darkhaven). Celedhring only: TAP: if at a Haven [H/K] to place a stored Vein of Arda with an item in the company: the item becomes a jewel and any bonuses it gives are increased by 1. Bearer makes a CC modified by -2.

Playable on Elrond, Erestor, or Nestador. Target character may tap to discard a dark enchantment controlled by another character in his company. Additionally, he is considered Radagast for the purpose of Herb-lore. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take Healing Song, Herb-lore, or Warm Now Be Heart and Limb from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. Your Dwarf characters and factions are each worth full MP.  Unhappy Blows and The Dark Days do not affect Elrond's company (or characters therein). You may discard this card to bring into play during the organization phase at Rivendell and under Elrond's DI a Dwarf with up to a six mind, which may be taken from your discard pile or hand.

Playable on a company. One minion Elf or Elf agent may be played as a hero character with the company at a Haven [H]; place this card with the Elf when he enters play. +1 to his mind. Discard him if he is the only Elf in the company. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item (reveal it as if it were a character).

Playable on a moving company with only Elves, Wizards, and/or Hobbits. For each Wilderness [w] in the company's site path you may tap a Nando or Silvan Elf in the company to lower their hazard limit by one; you may not tap more Elves in this fashion than there are hazards played on the company this turn. Environment hazards and creatures that require two or more Wildernesses in the site path do not count against the hazard limit this phase.

Elf-lord only. You may play and use minion treasure items as hero items. Your treasure and ring items borne by Elves are each worth full MP. Additionally, you may tap an Elf at a site in Hollin to take Gwaith-i-Mirdain from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a player. TAP: and tap an Elf sage to store a Reforging in his company or to replace an ore resource in the company with a Reforging from hand (discard the ore).

Elf-lord or Elessar only. Playable on a Lordhaven [H]. If your Cirdan, Bladorthin, or Thranduil bears Emerald of Doriath, your GI is increased by two. TAP: and tap an Elf with a mind of 5 or more (or any Nando or Silvan Elf) at the site to let him take control of one of the following items: Arrows Shorn of Ebony, Bow of Yew, Elven Cloak, Elven Rope. If Galadriel or Thranduil taps, he may take Emerald of Doriath instead. The item may be taken from your discard pile, sideboard, or hand. The Elf makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a site.

Elf-lord or Elessar only. Playable on a Lordhaven [H]. Your Palantiri are each worth full MP. TAP: and tap an Elf with a mind of 5 or more (or any Noldo or Sinda Elf) at the site to let him take control of one of the following items: Adamant Helmet, Elf-stone, Miruvor, or Scabbard of Chalcedony. If Cirdan or Elrond taps, he may take Jewel of Beleriand instead. The item may be taken from your hand, sideboard, or discard pile. The Elf makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a site.

Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Playable on Legolas. Legolas requires 2 points of influence to control and can only be controlled by Thranduil or GI.  He gains the ranger skill and +1 prowess against Orcs and Spiders. If he is the highest mind Elf in the company, he becomes a leader. Discard if Legolas is in a company without avatar and moves to a site not in Woodland Realm or its adjacent regions. TAP: during the end-turn-phase to bring Many Turns and Doublings from your discard pile to your play deck.

Unique. Playable at Celebannon, if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dwarves (-2)  -- apply once for each given race in the company -- Wood-elves (+2), Men of Lake-town (+2). TAP: bring Down the Hurrying Waters from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

Unique. Place this card on Cirdan if he is in play. Discard if Ring of Fire or a non-hazard, non-Fallen-wizard manifestation of Gandalf is in play. Ring of Fire cannot be played and Fallen-Gandalf may not use Narya. Cirdan is considered Gandalf for the purpose of Narya. TAP: during your organization phase to take Narya from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Playable during the site phase on The White Towers, if your company there contains at least three Dunedain and/or Elves and no Haven version of the site is in play. The company faces an attack: Wolves -- 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Afterwards, tap your Elf or Dunadan at the site or discard this card. Your Dunedain are Elves for the purpose of Palantir of Elostirion. The site never leaves play. All versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F]; replace their automatic-attacks with: Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against hero and covert companies). Fallen-wizards cannot use the Wizardhaven version. This card gives full MP to a Lord-player.

Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at Lorien if Galadriel is not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Nenya. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Galadriel has been successful (tap character and site). Values in parentheses and brackets apply to an Elf bearer. Nenya cannot be played. TAP: at the end of the organization phase, if borne by a character with mind 5 or more, to ignore one region in the company's site path (name and type; your choice) for the purpose of hazards; bearer makes a modified by -2.

Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. This card gives two corruption points when Elrond is at Rivendell. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take Vilya from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at any Elf- or Dwarf-hold, if Gandalf and Realm of Narya are not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Narya. May also be played at any site after CvCC  by the character whose strike against Gandalf (Cirdan if Realm of Narya is in play) has been successful (tap character and site). Values in parentheses/brackets apply to an Elf bearer. Narya cannot be played. TAP: at any time, if borne by a character with a mind of 5 or more, to untap up to 2 characters in the company. Bearer makes a CC modified by -2.

Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at Rivendell if you have stored Knowledge of Vilya and Elrond is not in play. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Elrond has been successful (tap character and site). Values in brackets and parentheses apply to an Elf bearer. Vilya cannot be played. TAP: and tap bearer during the organization phase to take a minion resource event from your discard pile to your hand. Bearer makes a CC modified by -2.
Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take Nenya from your discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Celeborn is in her company. Tap Galadriel and Celeborn if untapped. If both are in the same company, any influence, flattery, or offering attempt either of them makes is also modified by adding the unused DI of the other. Discard if either of them leaves play.

Playable during the site phase on a non-avatar Elf character at Grey Havens if Cirdan or Cirdor is there. Tap the site. Target Elf makes a CC. If still in play afterwards, place him "off to the side" with this card; store any items he controls and discard any allies. The Elf does not give any MP. This card may also be played on an opponent's character or revealed agent (under the same playability conditions); it then gives 1 MP to opponent instead.

Place this card in your MP. You may place any of your stored Book of Mazarbul, Scroll of Isildur, Lost Knowledge, or Stolen Knowledge resources with this card. If there are at least three different of such resources with this card, it gives 2 MP (even to a Fallen-Pallando or Fallen-Saruman player).

Playable on Galadriel. An opponent's character of your choice at Galadriel's site must make a CC modified by -2. If in play afterwards, opponent may remove a corruption card from the character; otherwise you may look at opponent's hand. Galadriel makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn for a given character.

Unique. Playable if a hero Elf with a mind of five or more is in play. Whenever a character with Rivendell or Lorien as a home site is assigned a strike from an Orc attack (or from an Orc in CvCC), its controlling player may choose to assign to the character another strike from the attack, regardless of its abilities or resources played. When this card would be discarded from play, you may remove it from the game instead, along with one Orc hazard creature which opponent has revealed to you through a mechanism of the game (your choice).

Unique. Playable at any Dark-hold [D] if the company has faced a Nazgul attack this turn.  Weapon.  May also be played at any site after CvCC by a character who has faced a strike from a Ringwraith (tap character and site). +2 DI against Elves and Dwarves. Warrior only: +3 prowess to a maximum of 10 (+4 against Drakes and Undead), and -1 to target's body. Sage only: bearer cannot be a target of Lava Flows, Dragon's Breath, or Scourge of Fire. TAP: bring Bitter Cold into play from the discard pile or sideboard; it is considered played on the bearer.

Playable on a character with Edhellond or Grey Havens as a home site. When moving to a port or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region, you may tap the character and discard from hand a Fair Sailing, Great Ship, Stars, or The Evenstar to replace the company's new site with another port or site in a Coastal Sea region in the same or an adjacent region. You may discard this card to take Fair Sailing, Favor of the Valar, Hair of Uinen, Stars, The Evenstar, or Ulmo's Watch from the discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated on a character.

Lord-player only. Place this card on your Lord if he is in play. Followers of your Lord cannot be a target of hazards that would return them to your hand (e.g. Call of Home). Additionally, +2 to your rolls for influence attempts against your characters that have the same home site as your Lord, and for rolls required by hazards that would return such a character to your hand or split him off from the company. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Unique. Elf-lord only. Playable on your Elf-lord if he controls an avatar-specific stage card, an item giving 7 or more MP and corruption points combined, and you have in play at least: 12 SP, 1 Elf faction, and 4 unique Elf characters. Discard if these conditions do not exist. +3 DI. If he is at one of your protected Lordhavens [H], your Lord may make influence attempts as if he were at any site in the same or an adjacent region as his site.

Unique. As a short event, playable if you discard from hand Favor of the Valar or Returned Beyond All Hope. Name a non-avatar Elf placed "off to the side" with Sail to the West or in any out-of-play pile. Make a roll and add the character's mind; if the result is greater than 10, he comes into play at Grey Havens (discard any Sail to the West he controls). If he was in play by your opponent, you must play a copy of the character from hand (opponent discards his copy). As a permanent-event, playable on an Elf with a mind of six or more placed "off to the side" with Sail to the West.

Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Place this card on Thranduil if he is in play. Your stored Clean the Greenwood are each worth full MP. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take a 'warrior only' resource or a non-unique Elf character from the discard pile to your hand.

Unique. Cirdan the Shipwright specific. Place on Cirdan if he is in play. Lindon becomes a Coastal Sea [c]. Cirdan may use Kindling of the Spirit as if he were a Wizard. TAP: during your end-of-turn phase to take Belegaer, Kindling of the Spirit, The Reach of Ulmo, or a non-unique Elf character from your discard pile into your hand.

Unique. Playable during the organization phase at a Haven [H] on a company with Elrond, Galadriel, and Gandalf (or Elrond, Galadriel, and Cirdan if Realm of Narya is in play). While in the company, each of these characters receives +2 to his prowess and DI, and +2 to any CC he makes for using resource short-events. Discard if the company does not contain at least three of the above named characters.

Playable if you are Alatar, Galadriel, Gandalf, Radagast, or Thranduil. Your Ent allies and factions are each worth full MP. When an opponent's company moves in a region containing a site where your avatar or your Ent ally or faction is located (or region adjacent), you may look at two random cards from opponent's hand for each Wilderness [w] in their site path.

Any roll for testing a gold ring is modified by: +1 for every Elven Ring in play; +1 for every two Dwarven Rings in play; +1 for every three Man and/or Spirit Rings in play; +1 for every five other rings in play. Discard if The One Ring comes into play. Cannot be duplicated.

Playable on a company at Lorien or Thranduil's Halls; may be played on your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if you start the game there. During the site phase at Dol Guldur, the company may face attacks based on the number of times this card is rotated: none: Orcs -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; once: Trolls -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess; twice: Nazgul -- 1 strike with 15 prowess; thrice: Fallen-Maia -- 1 strike with 20 prowess. If such an attack is defeated, tap your avatar or warrior at the site to rotate this card 90deg. If rotated 360deg, place it with Dol Guldur; it now gives 5 MP. The site does not leave play and all versions of Dol Guldur become a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s]. Cannot be duplicated on Dol Guldur.

Lord-player only. Playable on a non-avatar character of the same race as your Lord in your Lord's company (or in your starting company). Target receives +1 DI for each of his skills against characters and factions of his race. He may only be controlled by your Lord or GI. If he has the same home site as your Lord, he requires three fewer points of influence to control than normal (to a minimum of 3). Cannot be duplicated by a player.

Unique. Playable if you tap an Elf or Dunadan with a mind of seven or more (or any one Sinda Elf). When a hero company moves with at least three Wildernesses [w] or one Coastal Sea [c] in their site path, their size is considered two fewer than normal for the company that turn (to a minimum of 2). Additionally, if Gates of Morning is in play, each Elf, Dunadan, Maia, and Wizard in such a company gains the sage skill that turn and may tap to discard a card placed on-guard at his company's new site.

Unique. Playable at Shelob's Lair. Weapon. +2 prowess to a maximum of 11 (+4 prowess and -3 to target's body against Spiders, if bearer is a warrior). Bearer must always be assigned a strike from a Spider attack against his company, regardless of his status or the attack's normal abilities. He makes a CC modified by -1 when such an attack (or strike thereof) is cancelled or made ineffectual.
Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Royal Duo is in play. Once per phase, Galadriel may make a CC and (if still in play afterwards) untap.

Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Woodland Realm becomes a Wilderness [w]. TAP: and discard from hand an asterisk [*] creature playable keyed by name to Woodland Realm, Heart of Mirkwood or Western Mirkwood, to cancel an attack against one of your companies moving to a site in Woodland Realm (or with no other than these regions in their site path). TAP: during your end-turn-phase to take Elf-path or Refuge from your discard pile to your hand.

NameEN: Welcomed by the Lord and Lady
Text: Unique. Playable only with your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if you have two or more Elves with Lorien as a home site in play (or one such Elf and an avatar). Reveal this card when starting companies are determined as if it were a character. You may start the game at Lorien. Your Wizard or Lord may come into play there. Discard if you do not have a character with Lorien as a home site in play, or you have 6 SP or more.
fullCode: Welcomed by the Lord and Lady (FB)
normalizedtitle: welcomed by the lord and lady
DCpath: Firstborn/Welcomed by the Lord and Lady.jpg

Text: Playable on a character bearing and able to use a bow, when another character in his company faces a strike (not from a detainment or non-combat attack, nor in CvCC). Make a roll, adding the character's prowess (+3 if he is Nando or Silvan) and the normal MP of the bow. If the result is higher than the strike's prowess, modify the strike by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body. If target character is Nando or Silvan, you may shuffle this card into your play deck instead of discarding it. Cannot be duplicated against a strike.

Nearest Haven: Rivendell  Playable: Items* (minor)  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against hero companies)  Special: Dunland; Hollin. *Tap an Elf at the site with a mind of five or more to make major items or gold ring items playable here this turn.

Nearest Darkhaven: Carn Dum  Playable: Items (minor, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)    Special: Dunland; Hollin. Minion Elves may be brought into play at this site under GI. Slew the Great Warrior may be played here, regardless of the requirement to have a faction in play.

Nearest Haven: Lorien  Playable: Items (minor, major, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks: Traps* (Elven Wards) -- 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf)   Special: *A character with Thranduil's Halls as a home site may tap to cancel this automatic-attack.

Nearest Darkhaven: Dol Guldur  Playable: Items (minor, major, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks: Traps* (Elvish Wards) -- 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf)    Special: *A character with Thranduil's Halls as a home site may tap to cancel this automatic-attack. The first Elf creature played against a company at or moving to this site does not count against the hazard limit.

Nearest Haven: Lorien  Playable: Information  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf)   Special: Hidden site. Tap an Elf in the company to reveal this site. If Huinen is at Ceber Fanuin, you may tap this site to look at your opponent's hand; Huinen may then tap and make a CC to place any number of hazards seen there on the top or bottom of opponent's play deck.

Nearest Darkhaven: Dol Guldur  Playable: Information, Items (minor, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 3 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf and Huinen is not here)   Special: Hidden site. Tap an Elf in the company to reveal this site.

Nearest Haven: Lorien  Playable: Items (minor)  Special: Port-on-Celduin. Any Elf or Man in a company that has moved here this turn from a site in Northern Rhovanion or Dorwinion may tap to play Old Winyards.

Nearest Darkhaven: Dol Guldur  Playable: Information, Items (minor, major) --non-battle-gear items only--  Automatic-attacks (2): (1st) Elves -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies);  (2nd) Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (against overt companies only)  Special: Port-on-Celduin.

Nearest Haven: Lorien  Special: Only Elf and Maia hazard creatures with an asterisk [*] can be keyed to this site. Special items only playable at Lorien are playable at here. An Elf or Dunadan may tap during the site phase to remove a corruption, dark enchantment, or disease card played on another character in his company; both characters make a CC.

Nearest Darkhaven: Dol Guldur  Playable: Information, Items (minor, major, gold ring) --non-battle-gear items only--  Automatic-attacks (2): Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Elves -- 2 strikes with 10 prowess   Special: A company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by one. If Gandalf the White Rider or Lady of the Golden Wood is in play as a permanent-event, it must be used as additional automatic-attack (discard after use -- ignore result of defeat).
Playable: Information, Items* (minor, major, gold ring)   *non-battle-gear items only

Text: Nearest Haven: Lorien  Playable: Items (minor, major, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks: Undead. Awakened Plants -- 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded makes a CC   Special: If Vanish in Sunlight was played on an attack against the company this turn, Necklace of Girion and Barrow-blade are playable here and may be taken from your hand or discard pile.

Nearest Darkhaven: Dol Guldur  Playable: Items (minor, major, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks: Undead. Awakened Plants -- 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded makes a CC   Special: Non-unique hoard items are playable at this site.

Playable: Information  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 SP; detainment if you have less than 12 SP)   Special: Port. Cannot be used by overt companies. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. You receive the SP if one of your companies is at the site.

Special: Cirdan the Shipwright specific. Port. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the SP. Characters with this site as a home site may be brought into play here, regardless of the presence of any other character.

Playable: Information  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 SP; detainment if you have less than 12 SP)   Special: Port. Cannot be used by overt companies or if you are Cirdan. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. You receive the SP if one of your companies is at the site.

Adjacent sites: Thranduil's Halls (0)  Special: Elf-lord only. Elf-hold. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the SP. This site is not considered a Haven [H] for the purpose of bringing characters into play. When Thranduil's Halls would be chosen as rescue-site for an opponent's imprisoned character, you may use this site instead; you must provide opponent with a copy of this site when he wants to move here.

Special: Lady Galadriel specific. Port-on-Anduin. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the SP. Characters with Lorien as a home site may be brought into play here, regardless of the presence of any other character.

Playable: Information  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 3 strikes with 10 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 SP; detainment if you have less than 12 SP)   Special: Port-on-Anduin. Cannot be used by overt companies or if you are Galadriel. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. You receive the SP if one of your companies is at the site.

Nearest Haven: Grey Havens  Playable: Items (minor, major, greater)  Automatic-attacks: Undead -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled by any card effect requiring a skill); each character wounded makes a CC   Special: Any CC made by characters at this site is modified by -1.

Nearest Darkhaven: Carn Dum  Playable: Items (minor, major, greater)  Automatic-attacks: Undead -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled by any card effect requiring a skill); each character wounded makes a CC   Special: Non-Nazgul creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. Any CC made by characters at this site is modified by -1.

Adjacent Sites: Ost-in-Edhil (6)  Playable: Information, Items (minor, major, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks (2): (1st) Traps -- 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as automatic-attack a Nameless Thing, Watcher in the Water, or Elf creature from his hand; keep the creature with the site as 2nd automatic-attack until it is defeated.  Special: Contains a hoard. Hidden site. Discard a Stolen Knowledge card from the company to reveal this site. When a gold ring is tested at this site, the result of the roll is modified by +3.
Site Path From Lorien:   [w] [b] [b] [w] [b] [w]  Site Path From Elanthia:   [w] [s] [w] [ww] [w]  Special: Port-on-Sea of Rhun.
Path: w b b w b w / w s w w w w

Text: Nearest Darkhaven: Dol Guldur  Playable: Items (minor, major, greater)  Automatic-attacks (2): (1st) Elves -- each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Animals -- 4 strikes with 9 prowess (against overt companies only)  Special: Port-on-Sea of Rhun. Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.

Special: Elrond Half-elven specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the SP. Characters with Rivendell as a home site may be brought into play here, regardless of the presence of any other character.

Playable: Information  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 3 strikes with 10 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 SP; detainment if you have less than 12 SP)   Special: Cannot be used by overt companies or if you are Elrond. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. You receive the SP if one of your companies is at the site.

Nearest Haven: Rivendell  Playable: Information, Items (minor, gold ring*)  Automatic-attacks: Men -- 2 strikes with 7 prowess    Special: *Each time a company at this site plays a ring, it immediately faces an attack: Trap -- 1 strike with 10 prowess.

Nearest Darkhaven: Carn Dum  Playable: Information, Items (minor, gold ring*)  Automatic-attacks: Men -- 2 strikes with 7 prowess    Special: Contains a hoard. *Each time a company at this site plays a ring, it immediately faces an attack: Trap -- 1 strike with 10 prowess. One non-unique Elf creature may be played against a company at or moving to this site, regardless of their site path and not counting against the hazard limit.

Special: Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the SP. Characters with this site as a home site may be brought into play here, regardless of the presence of any other character.

Playable: Information  Automatic-attacks: Elves -- 3 strikes with 10 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 SP; detainment if you have less than 12 SP)   Special: Cannot be used by overt companies or if you are Thranduil. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. You receive the SP if one of your companies is at the site.

Nearest Haven: Rivendell  Special: Only Awakened Plant creatures and creatures with an asterisk [*] can be keyed to this site. Healing effects affect all characters at the site. Goldberry and Tom Bombadil are playable here.

Nearest Darkhaven: Carn Dum  Playable: Items (minor, major, gold ring)  Automatic-attacks: Maia -- 2 strikes with 15 prowess (cannot be cancelled)   Special: Only Awakened Plant and creatures with an asterisk [*] can be keyed to this site. Once tapped, this site cannot be untapped.

+2 DI against Dwarves with a mind and prowess lower than his. +1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, and Drakes. Cannot be duplicated by a given player unless he has Folk of Durin in play. TAP: give +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company against one attack (or in CvCC).  Home Site: any Dwarf-hold

Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Longbeard. Leader. +3 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess againsts Orcs, Trolls, and Wolves.  -2 MP if eliminated. If you are Balin, values in brackets apply and your ore resources are each worth full MP.  Balin gives no MP. If you have Lord of Dwarrowdelf or Reconquest of Khazad-dum in play, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.  Home Site: Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold

Unique. Manifestation of Bolg. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 9. +2 DI against Orcs. -2 DI if Rogrog or Witch-king of Angmar is in play. +1 prowess against Elves and Dwarves. When he is at Mount Gundabad, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand, and all attacks against his company keyed to the site are detainment. Home Site: Mount Gundabad
Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs and Drakes. Wound Borin to automatically defeat all strikes from a Trap attack against his company (no body check is required). Home Site: Barak-shathur

Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Manifestation of Dain II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 DI against Dwarves and Men. +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs, and Trolls. -3 MP if eliminated. If you are Dain, values in brackets apply and your Man factions in play at sites in Wilderland each give full MP.  Dain gives no MP. You may keep one more card than normal in hand if he controls King under the Mountain.  Home Site: Iron Hill Dwarf-hold

Unique. Longbeard. May not be among the starting characters. +4 DI against Fili, Frerin, Kili, Thorin II, and Thrain II. Discard Dis during the organization phase at any Dwarf-hold to replace her with one of these characters, which may be taken from your hand, discard pile, or play deck. Home Site: Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold

+1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. -1 to his influence attempts. +1 to his company's Under-deeps movement rolls. Unless it contains a manifestation of a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one Dwarven Miner. Home Site: any Dwarf-hold
Unique. Ironfist. +1 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Drakes and Orcs. TAP: at any time to prevent Old Grudge from being discarded from play this phase. Home Site: Nurunkhizdin
Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his influence attempts. May tap to support a character in his company even if he is assigned a strike from the same attack. Home Site: Nurunkhizdin
Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 to his company's Under-deeps movement rolls. Home Site: Iron Hill Dwarf-hold

Unique. Longbeard. +2 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 DI against the Blue Mountain Dwarves faction. Unless Thorin II is in play, King under the Mountain may be played on Frerin (as if on Thorin II). Home Site: Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold
Unique. Silvan Elf. TAP: bring Old Winyards from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. Home Site: Thranduil's Halls
Unique. Longbeard. Manifestation of Gimli. +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 prowess when Hunting Orcs is in play (+2 if an Elf is in his company). Home Site: Iron Hill Dwarf-hold

Unique. Manifestation of Beorn. Grey Agent. +2 prowess against Orcs. Agent only: May attack an overt company at a Shadow-hold [S]; the attack is not detainment. If an Animal, Wolf, or Orc hazard creature is played against a company at or moving to a site in the same or adjacent region as Goblin-basher's, he may immediately transfer to this site (even if you have it in play). Home Site: Beorn's House, The Carrock

+1 prowess against Orcs. Unless it contains a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one King's Advisor. TAP: take His Beard Long and Forked from your discard pile to your hand.  Home Site: any Dwarf-hold
+1 DI against Dwarf characters. +2 DI against Dwarf factions. +1 prowess against Orcs. Unless it contains a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one King's Judge. Home Site: any Dwarf-hold

Unique. Firebeard. Grey Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. Agent only: May use Under-deeps movement. TAP: if at a company's new site to create an additional automatic-attack at the site this turn: Traps -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess. TAP: if at a company's new site to prevent that company from moving again this turn. Home Site: The Gem-deeps, The Wind-deeps
Unique. Longbeard. +2 prowess against Orcs. May play Knowledge of the Enemy at any site if his company has faced an Orc attack that turn. Home Site: Iron Hill Dwarf-hold
Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his influence attempts. TAP: bring one food item from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. Home Site: Iron Hill Dwarf-hold

+1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his influence attempts. Unless it contains a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one Mountaineer. TAP: at the end of the organization phase to allow his company to move in a mountain region and not stop at a site therein this turn. Home Site: any Dwarf-hold

Unique. Longbeard. +2 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Dragons and Orcs. If he bears a treasure, he receives +1 to his prowess and body, and -2 DI. King under the Mountain may be played on him (as if on Dain II). TAP: bring one Songs of the Old from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. Home Site: any Dwarf-hold in Wilderland
Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. -3 to his influence attempts. Home Site: Iron Hill Dwarf-hold

Unique. Ironfist. +2 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 DI against the Ironfists faction. If Narin bears Dwarven Ring of Thelor's Tribe, he becomes a leader, gains the sage skill, and +1 to his CC. Home Site: Nurunkhizdin

Unique. Ironfist. +2 prowess against Men, Orcs, and Trolls. Swordmaster may be played on Norin as if he were a sage, and also at any Ruins & Lairs [R] (as if Information were playable there). Home Site: Nurunkhizdin

+1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. -1 to his influence attempts. Unless it contains a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one Pathfinder. TAP: cancel a Drake, Orc, or Troll attack keyed to Wilderness [w] against his company. Home Site: any Dwarf-hold

Unique. Firebeard. Agent. +1 prowess against Elves. -1 to his CC. Agent only: TAP: force opponent to take an ore resource or item of his choice stored at (or placed with) Tarin's site back into his hand. Home Site: Bar-en-Ibun, Nurunkhizdin

Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Manifestation of Thorin II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 DI against Dwarves, +2 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, and Wolves. -3 MP if eliminated. If you are Thorin, values in brackets apply and your hoard items each give full MP. Thorin gives no MP. You may keep one more card than normal in hand if he controls King under the Mountain or you have Reconquest of Khazad-dum in play.  Home Site: Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold

Unique. Longbeard. +2 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Men, Orcs, and Wolves. If Dain II is eliminated, Thorin III Stonehelm is considered a Dwarf-lord for the purpose of interpreting resources; King under the Mountain may be played on him (as if on Dain II). TAP: take All the Bells Ringing from your discard pile to your hand. Home Site: any Dwarf-hold in Wilderland

Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Manifestation of Thrain II. Longbeard. Leader. +3 DI against Dwarves, +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs, and Trolls. -3 MP if eliminated. If you are Thrain, values in brackets apply and your treature items each give full MP; Thrain gives no MP. You may keep one more card than normal in your hand if he controls King under the Mountain or Lord of Dwarrowdelf.  Home Site: any Dwarf-hold

Unique. Ironfist. +2 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Dwarves. When in play as a hero character and not controlled by your avatar, make a roll during the untap phase; if the result is less than five, discard Thulin II (one item may be transferred to a character in his company).  Home Site: Mines of Angurath

Unique. Firebeard. +1 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. He is considered a sage for the purpose of riddling attempts. You may take any resource played to modify a riddling roll in Tupor's company to your hand instead of discarding it from play; it may not be used for the same riddling roll. Home Site: Barak-shathur

Each moving company with a Dwarf majority has its hazard limit increased by half the number of Dwarves in the company (round down). Additionally, if Doors of Night, Eyes of the Shadow, or Growing Shadow is in play, the hazard player draws an additional card for each Dwarf with a mind of three or less in a moving company during the hazard phase. Cannot be duplicated. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.
The number of strikes and prowess of each Pukel-creature, Rock Fall, and Lava Flow attack are increased by one (by two if Doors of Night is in play). Cannot be duplicated.

Unique. Orc. Manifestation of Bolg. One strike. May be played keyed to Gundabad and Dragon-gap; and at sites in these regions and The Under-leas. Against a company that has faced a Wolf attack this turn, may also be played keyed to Anduin Vales, Angmar, Forovirkain, Grey Mountain Narrows, Grey Mountains, Misty Mountains - Northern Spur, Northern Rhovanion; or at sites in these regions. One strike of Bolg, Son of Azog must always be assigned to the highest mind Dwarf in the company.

Playable on a company containing a greater or treasure item and a Dwarf majority, moving to a non-Dwarf-hold, non-Under-deeps site. Opponent must replace the company's new site with a site from his location deck that is an Under-deeps site or surface site. The company must be able to legally move to this site (from their site of origin). If no such site is available, discard this card; otherwise, place it in opponent's MP.

Playable on a company that is not moving. An attack is created against the company, which is a duplicate of one automatic-attack (without modifications) of a site in the same or adjacent region as the company's site, or of an adjacent Under-deeps site (attacker's choice; not a non-combat attack). If not in play, reveal the site from either location deck to establish the attack; this must be a version which target company is allowed to use. Cannot be revealed as an on-guard card. Cannot be duplicated in a movement/hazard phase.

Environment. Playable on a Troll at or moving to a non-Under-deeps, non-Darkhaven site if Doors of Night is not in play. The Troll makes a body check, modified by +1 for each Gates of Morning, Sun, or The Sun Shone Fiercely in play, and by -1 if he is wounded, a surface site, or is an Olog-hai or Half-troll. Failing this check wounds the Troll, or eliminates him if he was already wounded (treat a discard result as failing).

Dwarves. Three stirkes. Detainment against hero companies. May be played keyed to any Dwarf-hold or ancient Dwarf-ruin; and also to the regions containing such a site and to High Pass. If Hunting Orcs or The Watchful Peace is in play, may also be played at any Under-deeps site. If The Dark Days is in play, the attack becomes normal against hero companies that do not contain a Dwarf or Wizard.

Unique. +2 prowess against Dragons. Each overt company moving in Anduin Vales, Misty Mountains, High Pass, and/or Redhorn Gate faces an attack (considered a hazard creature attack): Animals (Eagles) Flying -- 4 strikes at 11/6 (attacker chooses defending characters). If Gates of Morning or The Watchful Peace is in play, this attack also affects Dunland, Enedwaith, Gap of Isen, Grey Mountain Narrows, and Wold & Foothills. Unless this attack is defeated, characters in the company cannot use cards that require the scout or ranger skill this turn; ongoing effects of such cards are cancelled.

Hobbit. One strike. +3 prowess against Dragons. Attacker chooses defending character; all strikes are assigned to the same character. May only be played against minion and overt companies, following a non-detainment Dwarf attack or at a site where a hero company with a Dwarf majority is present. Make a roll for a successful strike instead of a body check (character is not harmed): discard an item in the company with a random number closest to the result (defender's choice if tied).

Playable on a Dwarven Ring, treasure, or greater item borne by a Dwarf-lord. The item gives 2 fewer corruption points (to a minimum of 1) and cannot be transferred during the organization phase. Opponent receives 3 SP. At the end of the organization phase, if opponent's total SP is greater than the Dwarf-lord's mind, the highest mind Dwarf in the company (not the Dwarf-lord) and his followers split from the company; either company must move to another site this turn. If there are no non-follower Dwarves in the company, the company must move. Cannot be duplicated on an item. Discard if the item is stored.

Playable on an Under-deeps surface site. The hazard player may replace one of the site's automatic-attacks with an automatic-attack of an adjacent Under-deeps site. Additionally, if The Reach of Ulmo is in play, any Animal or Drake creature keyable to Coastal Seas [c] may be played at the site. Discard if such an (automatic-)attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated on a site.

Playable on a (grey) agent at an Under-deeps surface site. The agent may use Under-deeps movement (as an agent action; no movement roll is required). If the agent is My Precious and is at an Under-deeps site, he receives +2 prowess. If this card is in your discard pile, you may play it as if it were in your hand.

Corruption. Playable on a ring special item or treasure borne by a Dwarf. The item gives two fewer corruption points (to a minimum of one). Covetous Thoughts may be played on/affects hero Dwarves in the company (except the bearer of target item). Discard if there are no Dwarves in the company. Cannot be duplicated on an item. TAP: take Covetous Thoughts, Greed, or Grasping and Ungracious from your discard pile to your hand.

Troll. One strike. If revealed as an on-guard  creature, attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played at a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least two Wildernesses [w] or one Desert [DE] in its site path, or that is in a mountain region.

Any company moving in a mountain region or in High Pass, Redhorn Gate, Bosiri, Clyan, Dragon Gap, or Narthalf faces an attack: Rock Fall -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Additionally, non-unique Giant hazard creatures may be played keyed to these regions, and to their adjacent regions if Arda Angered or Doors of Night is in play.

Unique. Undead. Dwarf. One strike. May also be played at Bar-en-Ibun, Cameth Brin, and The Worthy Hills. Against a company with a treasure item, may also be played keyed to a Shadow-land [s] or ancient Dwarf-ruin.

Spider. Trap. Before assigning strikes, opponent must call "odds" or "even". To assign strikes, each character in the company makes a roll: if the result corresponds with opponent's choice, the character must face a strike (resolve strike immediately). Attack and strikes of King Spider cannot be cancelled by general card effects (e.g. Ruse), but a scout may tap to cancel a strike he is facing.

Unique. Animal. Eagle. Manifestation of Gwaihir. Flying. Three strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. As a creature, may be played keyed to High Pass, Anduin Vales, Misty Mountains, Wold & Foothills; and at sites in these regions. If The Watchful Peace is in play, may also be played keyed to non-Dark-domain regions adjacent to these. May only be played against overt companies. As a short-event, bring Eagles Ahunt or a hazard creature with an asterisk [*] from your discard pile to your hand.

Dwarves. Three strikes. +2 prowess against Orcs. Detainment against hero companies. As a creature, may be played at any Dwarf-hold or site where a Dwarf-lord is present; and also keyed to the region containing such a site. As a long-event, Naugol gives +1 to prowess and strikes of any Dwarf attack created by Old Enemies, and causes Ride Against the Enemy to give +1 to prowess and strikes of any Dwarf attack created by it. Cannot be duplicated.
All Dwarf attacks receive +1 prowess and +1 body; all Dwarf attacks with no body have 5 body. Discard when a Dwarf attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

Animal. One strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played at any swamp or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region. If The Reach of Ulmo or Terror from the Deeps is in play, may also be played at any Under-deeps site.

Playable on a unique hero faction in play. Each overt company moving in a region containing the faction's site (or region adjacent) faces an attack: same type as the faction, with a number of strikes equal to the faction's MP. Each strike has a prowess of 10, and a body of 9 minus the number of strikes assigned. If the attack is defeated, the faction is eliminated (it may be taken as a trophy). Cannot be duplicated on a faction.

Playable on an Orc attack with at least four strikes, before strikes are assigned. Each character in the attacked company immediately faces a strike with 6 prowess; he receives +1 prowess against this strike for each armor, helmet, and/or shield he bears. Afterwards, the Orc attack resolves normally.

Playable on a character facing a strike from an Orc creature attack. If the strike is successful, the character is not harmed and is taken prisoner at a Dark-hold [D], Shadow-hold [S], or Ruins & Lairs [R]. At the start of his untap phases, make a body check for the character modified by -1. Rescue-attacks (2): Orcs --  2 strikes with 7 prowess, Orcs --  1 strike with 10 prowess.
Orcs. Two strikes. If all strikes against a moving company are successful, the company's new site is tapped.

Playable on a non-Hobbit character with two or more skills. Target character must attempt to move to a new site each turn, or else tap at the end of his organization phase (if untapped). Once per turn during his organization phase, another character in the company may tap to attempt to remove this card. Make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a character.

Playable on-guard at an ancient Dwarf-ruin or site with a Dwarf, Orc, or Trap automatic-attack. Reveal after the company faced all automatic-attacks. Make a roll, adding 1 for each scout and each ranger in the company; if the result is less than 13, the company faces an attack: Trap -- 1 strike with 12 prowess, which must be assigned to the character with a random number closest to the roll's result (defender's choice if tied). The defending character receives +1 prowess for each armor, helmet, or shield he bears. Any resulting body check is modified by +1.

Undead. Three strikes. May be played at any ancient Dwarf-ruin or site containing a hoard. Unless the attack is cancelled or defeated, place Ta-Fa-Lisch with the site; after an item is played at the site, place this card with the item. The bearer of target item faces an attack alone from this creature at the start of his movement/hazard phases, until it is defeated, or until the item leaves play or is stored (remove this card from the game).

Any Animal or Drake hazard creature normally playable keyed to Coastal Seas [c] may be played keyed to non-Desert regions adjacent to a Coastal Sea region (but not adjacent to Mouths of the Anduin or Sea of Rhun). Discard when such a creature played keyed to such a region is defeated, or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

Non-unique Orc hazard creatures may be played keyed to any mountain region or region containing an Orc-hold; and also at sites in such regions. If Doors of Night or Shadow of Mordor is in play, they may also be played at any Under-deeps surface site.
Does not count against the hazard limit. Against moving companies hazard creatures may be played keyed to their site of origin (or the last site moved to this turn). Cannot be duplicated.

Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] (not in a Free-domain [f]). Place a non-unique Drake creature from your hand with this card; it must be able to attack in any regions of the site's site path, or in the site's region. Companies at any version of the site face an attack by the attached creature at the beginning of their site phase. At the end of the organization phase, a company at this site makes a roll, subtracting one for every non-warrior character it contains: if the result is less than 5, they may not move that turn. Discard when the attached creature is defeated. Cannot be duplicated on a site.
Mountain Region. Dorwinion, Horse Plains, Sea of Rhun, Southern Rhovanion

Unique. Thorin specific. Playable on your Lordhaven [H] if you have stored at least two ore and/or treasure resources there. +3 to your GI. Your characters may play and make influence attempts here against any faction, as if at the site where the faction is normally playable: discard stored ore and/or treasure resources with a combined normal MP equal to the number of contiguous regions from the haven to the site where the faction is playable, minus 1 (resources worth 0 MP count as 1). After a successful influence  attempt, a character in the company may tap to play a food item, which may be taken from your discard pile or sideboard.

NameEN: A More or Less Decent Giant
Text: Giant. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven, non-Dark-hold site in a mountain region or in High Pass, with a company containing a diplomat. For the purpose of resolving non-combat attacks his base prowess is considered to be 10. Only one A More or Less Decent Giant may be in a given company.
fullCode: A More or Less Decent Giant (DF)
normalizedtitle: a more or less decent giant
DCpath: DurinsFolk/A More or Less Decent Giant.jpg

Text: Balrog specific. Playable on a site where you have played Lord and Usurper. The site becomes one of your Darkhavens [K]. Additionally, Growing Shadow may be played on the site's region (or an adjacent region), regardless of any other requirements; if played on such a region, it is not discarded until this card is discarded. Cannot be duplicated on a site.

Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on Dol Guldur. Attacks against companies at minion Dol Guldur are not cancelled as per the site card. Tap a Dwarf or sage at the site to search your play deck or discard pile and take Thrain (II) or Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur into your hand. If Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site, all versions of Dol Guldur become a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold. A minion character may tap to discard this card after CvCC at the site that turn.

Balrog specific. You may play Breach the Hold on any Under-deeps site with an adjacent site that is a Dwarf-hold (as if The Rusted-deeps). You may play Invade Their Domain on any Dwarf-hold (as if Iron Hill Dwarf-hold), if its adjacent Under-deeps site has Breach the Hold. Cannot be duplicated by a player.

Dwarf only. One influence check by a Dwarf is modified by adding half his mind value (round up). Negative modifications for his race are cancelled. Afterwards, if the check is successful, you may remove one hazard permanent-event from the influencing character. Cannot be duplicated for an influence attempt.

Song. Playable on a Hobbit facing a strike from an Animal, Spider, Wolf, or Awakened Plant attack. The Hobbit receives +5 prowess against the strike.
