Text: [MP: (2)] Trophy. Playable during the site phase on an overt company at an untapped site in Rohan. Tap the site. The company faces an attack: Men -- 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, Tap a character in the company or discard this card.   Alternatively, playable on an overt company after CvCC this turn. Tap a character in the company. Opponent must choose and discard a horse ally controlled by one of his wounded characters at the site; otherwise discard this card.May be stored at a Darkhaven [K]. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.

Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company that can legally move to Rohan. This card is used as a site card: Free-hold [F] in Rohan (draw: 1/1). During the site phase here you may tap Red Arrow or discard Oaths You Have Taken from hand (for no effect) to invert this card.     If inverted, place this card in your mp instead of discarding it: it is worth 1 mp and whenever one of your Dunedain taps to support one of your Man characters with a home site in Greater Gondor (or vice versa) he give +2 to his prowess or CP (instead of +1). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

[CP: 1; SP: 2] Fallen-wizard only. Place this card on your Fallen- wizard if he is in play. He may use spirit-magic.  +3 to his riddling, offering and flattery attempts.     Additionally, you may at any time discard one Honey on the Tongue or Poison of His Voice from hand to tap one non-avatar character (or two Man characters) at your Wizard's site. Wizard makes a CP. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

[MP: 2; Mind: 3; P/B: 6/7] Unique. Ent. Playable at any non-Haven site in Fangorn. When Beechbone becomes wounded, all other Ents in his company receive +3 prowess that turn and may face automatic-attacks and hazards keyed to the site. Discard Beechbone if his company moves to a site that is not in: Fangorn, Gap of Isen, Wold and Foothills, Enedhwaith, Redhorn Gate or Misty Mountains Southern Spur.

[MP(*); SP: 1] Saruman specific. Prisoner. Playable on an overt company, if your opponent is a white player. All your successful strikes in CvCC do not wound characters. Instead, they are taken prisoner with the company and placed under this card with all non-follower cards they control (discard any allies). This card and any cards attached may be stored at Isengard: it is worth 1 mp for each character and item attached.     For every prisoner placed under this card the hazard limit against the company is increased by 1. If 2 or more characters leave the company (for any reason), or if a character in the company is wounded in CvCC, the characters placed under this card form a company at their current site.

Playable on a warrior character at his home site, if you have a unique faction in play at the site. +1 to his mind and prowess. While no other leader is in his company, target character becomes a leader. He may tap to take one All the Bells Ringing, Engines of Defence, Incite Defenders, or Town Guard from your discard pile to your hand. Discard this card if target character moves to a site that is not in the same region as his home site (or a region adjacent) nor adjacent to his home site. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Spell. Wizard only. Playable during the organization phase, if your opponent is a Fallen-wizard or minion and his avatar is in play.   Place this card on another character in your Wizard's company, or bring Denethor II or Theoden into play (if at their home site; from your hand or discard pile) under the Wizard's DI with this card. Both your and opponent's avatar now make a CP in turns (your Wizard going first), modifying the CP each round by an additional -1, until one of them fails. A failed CP only results in tapping the avatar (if untapped; ignore any other effect). If your Wizard fails, discard this card. Otherwise, discard any corruption or disease on target character. +1 to his body. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. Wizard makes a CP modified by -3.

[MP: (1)] Prisoner. Playable on a company after a failed attack or failed influence attempt by an opponent's face up agent  at their current site this turn. Tap a character and take the agent prisoner with the company (place this card with the prisoner under control of the host character).      You may store the prisoner and this card for 1 mp at a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. If stored and your opponent is a minion player, a Fallen-wizard, or a Lord of the same race as the agent, the prisoner is considered one of his characters in play. Discard this card if the prisoner is rescued.

Playable on a moving company facing an attack, if all characters in the company control a horse ally and no other allies are in the company (if Shadowfax is in the company, 1 Hobbit need not control a horse ally). You assign all strikes from the attack. The attack's prowess is modified by -1 for every 3 characters that do not get to receive a strike; the attack's body is modified by -1 for every 5 characters that do not get to receive a strike.       Alternatively, playable if you initiate CvCC at a Ruins & Lairs [R] and each character in the company controls a horse ally: + 2 prowess to all your characters.

Armor. Playable on a wolf ally or Noble Hound.  -1 body to all strikes against the ally. If the ally has faced a strike from a defeated creature he gains the warrior skill (invert this card or place a token). Cannot be duplicated on a given ally.

Unique. Playable on Eowyn. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item. +1 to Eowyn's prowess, body and mind. +1 to her CP if in the company with a Hobbit or character with home site Edoras. You may play Helm of Her Secrecy as if Eowyn were in your hand.     Discard this card if Eowyn taps during the site phase, or if Helm of Her Secrecy is in play during the end-of-turn phase.

Playable on a hero company. One grey agent may be played as a character with the company at one of your Havens [H].   Place this card with the agent when he enters play. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item (reveal this card before playing a grey agent).     Alternatively, playable during the organization phase on one of your face up grey agents bearing Deeds of Lonely Daring. Discard Deeds of Lonely Daring; target agent becomes one of your characters in active play.

Playable on Aragorn II or a Dunadan with a home site in Eriador, if he bears a weapon and makes an influence attempt or faces a strike. Modify the roll by the prowess bonus the weapon gives him. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.
Search through your discard pile for one Ent faction, or Ent ally and placed it in your hand.

Unique. Playable at any Border-hold [B] or non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Wilderness [w]; this region must not be in Eriador, Gondor, Mordor, or Wilderland, nor be adjacent to a Shadow-land [s] or Dark-domain [d]    and if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Ents of Fangorn (+4), each Ent ally in the company (+2), Wizards (-5). Muster or Threats has no effect on an attempt to influence this faction. You may reveal Entwives from hand during the movement/ hazard phase to cancel the discarding of any Ent allies moving to a site where Entwives is playable. This faction gives 4 mp if you have a Man faction in play at a site Entwives' current region.

[MP: 1] Playable if a character with home site Helm's Deep or a site in Rohan was eliminated this turn. Cannot be duplicated for a given character. Discard this card to discard a corruption card from one of your characters with home site Helm's Deep or a site in Rohan.

[MP: 0] Black player only. Playable on a characters bearing and able to use a Palantir. Discard this card if these requirements are not met. Once per turn, you may discard a Messenger of Mordor from hand and name an item (or two items if opponent has a Palantir in active play). If the item is in opponent's hand, he must discard it. Alternatively, if your opponent has a Palantir in active play, you may name one of opponent's stored non-special items instead and tap target character to make an influence attempt against this item (as if held by an opponent's character at the site; treat his DI and mind as zero).

Playable with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. Instead of a normal character, you may play one non-overt character (or two Hobbits) with the starting company regardless of his race. Additionally, the character's home site is not considered when determining the company's starting site.   Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

[MP: (-*)] Playable on a unique character or ally with a prowess less than 5. Bearer receives +2 prowess against all attacks from agents, Nazgul, Slayers, and Assassin. When bearer must make a body check, rotate this card 90deg (or place a token; maximum of 3 times). Discard this card to modify a CP for target character by the number of tokens on this card. This card is worth -1 miscellaneous mp for each token on it. When this card is discarded, place it in your mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.
[MP: 1] Unique. Playable on Pippin if he bears a Palantir. He may tap to use a Palantir he bears. Discard this card if Pippin does not  bear a Palantir.

[MP: 2(4); SP: 0] Playable on a company containing an overt character at a non-Haven non-Dark-hold site in a Jungle [j] region or in Mirkwood, Fangorn, Lotan, Old Forest or Taur Romen. The company faces 3 attacks: Awakend Plants -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess; 2 strikes with 11 prowess; 1 strike with 14 prowess. These attacks cannot  only be cancelled by discarding a Blasting Fire or Liquid Fire from the company. After these attacks, tap a character and the site or discard this card. If played at a site in Fangorn or Old Forest, invert this card.      This card may be stored at one of your protected Wizardhavens [H] for 2 mp (4 if inverted); you may take one stage resource playable on/at Deep Mines from your play deck or discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

[MP: 2] Prisoner. Playable with one of your Seize Prisoners in active play. Keep this card with the Seize Prisoners; it counts as prisoner for the purpose of interpreting card effects. Unless this card is stored, opponent makes a roll during each of your end-of-turn phases: if the result is greater than 9, discard the Seize Prisoners and place this card in your mp for 1 mp. Cannot be duplicated for a given Seize Prisoners.

Playable on Edoras. Any character at Edoras and with Edoras as a home site may tap during the organization phase to bring one Horses, Noble Steed, Shadowfax, or Wild Horses from the discard pile to their play deck. Any character that taps in this fashion makes a CP. Discard this card if the site leaves active play, or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

NameEN: Grim Morn and a Golden Sunset
Text: [MP: (3); SP: 2] Theoden King specific. Place this card on Theoden King if he is in play. The company may contain any number of leaders.  You may play Evermind on eliminated horse allies. Place this card in your mp if Theoden King is eliminated. If this card is in your mp, all your Evermind are worth 2 mp.     tap: when you play Hour of Need on a character in the company. This card does not untap normally.     If tapped, invert this card when you play Valour in Battle on Theoden King. If inverted, place this card in your mp when you play Charge! on the company: it is worth 3 mp. Cannot be duplicated.

Warrior or sage only: +2 prowess against non-combat attacks.     tap: at any time to give -2 to the prowess and body of any character at the site that has used a magic or spell resource that turn.

[MP: 2; CP: 2; DI: +1; Prowess: +2(+3)] Unique. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (to a maximum of 8). Man or Dunadan warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9), and -1 to target's body against Wolves and Uruk-hai.      Eomer or Eowyn only: +1DI.

[SP: 1] Saruman specific. Saruman may enter play at any Free-hold [F], Border-hold [B] or non-Dragon's lair Ruin's & Lairs [R] where rings are playable. Cannot be duplicated.

[MP: 2, CP: 2; Prowess: +2(+3); Body: (+1)] Unique. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (to a maximum of 8). Man or Dunadan warrior only:  +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9), and -1 to target's body against Wolves and Uruk-hai.     Theoden or Theodred only: +1 body (to a maximum of 10).

[MP: 4] Unique. Playable during the site phase at Isengard, if you have in play at least three Ent allies and/or Ent factions. May be played regardless of The Fortress of Isen. May not be played if you are a Fallen-wizard or you have a manifestation of Saruman in play. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled); Wolves -- 3 strikes with 7 prowess; Orcs -- 4 strikes with 8 prowess; Flame Traps -- 2 strikes with 10 prowess. After the attacks, tap a character and the site and place this card in your mp, or discard this card.      Discard The Fortress of Isen if in play. Stage versions of Isengard cannot be used by any player. If your opponent has more than one stage card in play, he must discard one stage card of his choice (or your choice if he is Saruman).
Each of your characters in active play with a mind of three or more and which normally does not give any mp now gives 1 mp (even if you are an Atani-lord or Fallen-Gandalf).

Playable on a company during CvCC (even after strikes are assigned), if Gates of Morning is in play and at least two characters are wounded (or taken prisoner with opponent's company). May also be played during opponent's site phase. Any of your characters at sites in the same territory as the company's current site, or any character in your hand whose home site is in the same territory, may now join the company. Each of these characters may face a strike already assigned to another character in the company.

[MP: 1; CP: 1] Unique. Instrument. Playable by Merry at Edoras (even if the site is tapped). Cannot be transferred during the organization phase.      tap: take one Charge!, The Rohirrim or Reunion from your discard pile to your hand.     Tap: give +3 to an influence check bearer makes against a hero faction.

[MP: 2; CP: 1; Body: +1] Unique. Helmet. +1 body to a maximum of 9.      tap: shuffle one warrior only resource event used by the bearer of this item this phase into your play deck instead of discarding it.

[MP: (*), Mind: 1; P/B: -7/8] Playable on a hazard creature with an asterisk (*) and with one strike for each of its attacks, attacking a non-overt company. All attacks are cancelled and the creature becomes an ally under the control of any character in the company that taps. Keep this card with the creature. The ally has a mind of 1, prowess equal to its normal prowess minus 7, and a body as listed on its card (8 if none is listed). This card is worth ally mp as listed on the creature's card.  Alternatively, may be played as a short-event to cancel a detainment attack against a hero company.

Unique. Playable on a company containing a Hobbit and an Ent. taAt the start of their movement/hazard phase, when moving to a site  in The Shire or a Wilderness [w] region, you may tap a Hobbit and an Ent in the company to prevent any Ent allies in the company from being discarded as per their card effect.     Additionally, any Ent in the company may face strikes from attacks keyed to a site and from automatic-attacks. Discard this card if the company does not contain a Hobbit and an Ent.

[MP: (1); Mind: +2; DI: +2; CP: (+1)] Unique. Playable on Theoden, Theodred, or Eomer.   This card must always be transferred to the first character in line in active play, according to the above mentioned order (or discarded it if that character is in play by opponent).     + 2 to bearer's mind. + 2 DI against characters and factions playable at sites in Rohan, Gap of Isen and Anorien. Bearer may automatically influence the Riders of Rohan. +1 to his CP if a character with a home site in Rohan is present in his company. If not played on an avatar, this card is worth 1 mp.

[CP: 1 (2)] Playable on a Palantir (not Palantir of Elostirion). If bearer is able to use the Palantir, you may discard a Far Sight or All Thought Bent upon It from hand to invert this card. During any of your next turns, you may re-invert this card to either take a resource from your play deck to your hand or cancel the effects of one hazard in play (for the rest of the turn). You may not invert this card again the same turn.      When you invert this card, bearer must make a CP for each Palantir in active play (modify by -2 if its bearer has a higher mind or if your opponent is Sauron). Cannot be duplicated on a given Palantir. This card gives 2 corruption points if the bearer is a minion or overt character.

[SP: 2; DI: +2] Theoden King specific. Playable on Eomer, Elfhelm, Erkenbrand or Theodred, if in a company with Theoden (or in your starting company). +2 DI against characters with a home site in Rohan. Target character becomes a leader (if not already) and can only be controlled by your Lord or GI. Attacks against his company keyed to Rohan by name are detainment. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

[MP: 2] Unique. Playable at Edoras or Dunharrow if the influence check is greater than 12.  Standard Modifications: Men with a home site in Rohan (+2), for each Wild Horses in play (+1), for each Shadowfax or Snowmane in the company (+3).     tap: at any time to tap all horse allies in an opponent's company moving through Rohan or at a site in Rohan.

[SP: 1] Unique. Theoden King specific. Playable on Edoras. May also be played during the end-of-turn phase. The site becomes a Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Edoras as their home site may be brought into play under GI at this site (regardless of the presence of any other character). Only agents that have Edoras as a home site may move to this site.     Discard this card when the site leaves active play or when Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is successfully played at the site.

[MP: 1] Unique. Playable at Dunharrow if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: none.     tap: take a horse ally playable at a site in Rohan from your discard pile to your hand.

[MP: 1] Unique. Playable at Helm's Deep if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: none.     tap: take a battle-gear item playable at a site in Gap of Isen from your discard pile to your hand.

[MP: 1; Mind: 2; P/B: 2/7] Horse. Playable at any tapped or untapped Border- hold [B]. May not be controlled by a Dwarf, Hobbit, Ringwraith or overt character.  If each character in the company controls a horse ally, the company may move up to two additional regions.     tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against itself.

Playable at the end of the organization phase with a company that can legally move to Taur Romen and discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. This card is used as a site card: Border- hold [B] in Taur Romen (draw: 2/2). Elves may heal at this site. Wandlimb, Willowshanks and Entwives are playable at this site without further requirements: discard any Man factions you have in play. Place this card in your mp instead of discarding it from play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

[MP: 0; CP: 1] Weapon. Dunadan, Elf, or Man warrior only, if controlling a horse ally: +1 prowess (to a maximum of 8) and +1 to the ally's prowess and body. Discard this item to give -1 body to a strike bearer faces; another weapon may be used against the same strike.

Playable on a company with 4 or less characters and allies during the organization phase or in a starting company in lieu of a minor item. The company may not use starter movement or move to an Under-deeps site and its hazard limit is increased by 1. The company may move an additional region, to a maximum of 5. Discard during your organization phase if you choose or if the company has more than 4 characters and allies. Cannot be duplicated on a given company

Playable during the organization phase on a character at a Ruins & Lairs  [R]. Tap the character and take a resource, character or hazard playable at the site from your sideboard to your hand (show opponent); if a resource, it cannot be normally worth more than 1 mp. Remove this card from the game.

[MP: 0; CP: 0] Playable during the site phase on a character bearing a ring special item. You may take a manifestation of Gollum from your discard pile to your hand. The ringbearer must face at least 1 strike from the attack. If still in play afterwards, My Precious is considered at this site (no site card is required if none is available).

[MP: 3] Unique. Playable at Isengard if you have Greater Half-orcs or Sharku in play and if the influence check is greater than 12.Standard Modifications: a manifestation of Saruman is in the company (+5), Greater Half-orcs (+2).    tap: during organization phase to play a Half- orc character from your discard pile under EI at Isengard.

[SP: 1] Place this card on your avatar if he is in play. Once per turn, you may tap your avatar to play a stage card normally playable only during the organization phase (if the conditions to play it exist). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

[DI: +1; Prowess: +1] Playable on a warrior controlling two or more Valour in Battle. Target character receives +1 prowess and +1 DI. Additionally, he may take control of a non-unique, non-hoard minor or major battle-gear item when you play this card, which may come from your hand, discard pile or sideboard. Tap character if untapped. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

[MP: -1] Playable during the site phase at an untapped  Free-hold [F], Border-Hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R]. Playable on a company, if a character with a home site in Northern Rhovanion, Anduin Vales or Rohan has been eliminated by a strike from an Orc, Troll or Wolf attack this turn. +2 prowess against attacks and strikes of these types for all characters in the company with a home site in these regions. Discard this card during the end-of-turn phase when such an attack was defeated by the company that turn, or if an opponent's character of these types was eliminated in CvCCC. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

[MP: (2), SP: 2] Unique. Theoden King specific. You may place any of your horse allies controlled by your characters at Edoras "off to the side" with this card during the site phase. If there are at least 3 horse allies under this card, it is worth 2 ally mp. Minion only. Playable during the site phase on a company at a version of a hero Haven [H], if the bearer of The One Ring is there. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled): Dwarves-- 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Dunedain  -- 3 strikes with 10 prowess; Elves -- 2 strikes with 15 prowess. You must engage in CvCC with any of opponents' companies at the site (overriding any card effect; cannot be cancelled).      Following these attacks, if opponent's bearer of The One Ring is wounded, tap a character in the company to take control of The One Ring. Otherwise, tap your bearer of The One Ring and make a CP; if still in play afterwards you win the game.

NameEN: Allies in the East and South

Discard this card if these conditions are not met. You may tap one unique faction playable at a site in one of these territories to reduce the hazard limit against one of your companies moving through a region in such a territory by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Additionally, all influence attempts made by your opponents against such factions are modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Playable on Anborn, Damrod, or Mablung.  +2 to target character's mind, prowsess and body (to a maximum of 8), and gains a home site Henneth Annun. [MP: 0; CP: +1] Unique. Playable by Arwen at Minas Tirith or Rivendell, if Aragorn II controls Return of the King, Ring of Barahir or Sceptre of Annuminas. [SP: 1] Dunadan-lord only. Playable on a Border-hold [B]  or Free-hold [F] in Greater Gondor. [MP: 1(2)] Unique. Playable at Olyavud if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Umli (+2), Dunedain (+1), Dwarves (+1)  This faction is worth 2 mp if placed under Profitable Trade.

Unique. Manifestation of Gostir. Playable at Hollow Spire if the influence check is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+3) or a greater item (+6).     All attacks by manifestations of Gostir against any of your companies are cancelled. Any company moving in Azjan, Barl Syrnac, Lhugdalf, Mur Fostisyr and/or Ukal Sej faces an attack: Cold- dragon -- 3 strikes at 14/8 prowess/body.

[MP: 2(5); CP: 5; DI: +4, P: +1(+5); B: +1] Unique. Weapon. Two-handed. Playable at Ancient Deep-hold or The Vaults of Utumno by an Orc or Troll leader with a prowess of at least 6.  +4 to EI; +1 to body. Warrior only: +1 to prowess (to a maximum of 10). A stored Dark Forges may be placed with this item to "restore" it. Once restored, Hammer of the Under-world gives 5 mp, and +5 to prowess (to a maximum of 12).

[MP: 2(3)] Unique. Playable at Lothragh Camp if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (-2), Men (+1), Logath Herdsmen (-2), Demon trophy in company (+4).      tap: give -2 prowess to any Animal or Wolf creature attack against one of your companies moving in the Northern Waste or its adjacent regions in Great Central Plains or Wilderland. If you defeated a creature modified by Lothragh, it is worth 3 MP.

Unique. Playable at a site in the Northern Waste where you have stored at least 5 greater and/or major items by a Dragon character if the influence check is greater than 12.   All hazard creature creature attacks against any of your companies at or moving to a site in the Northern Waste receive -1 to the prowess and body.

Ice-orcs. Playable at a tapped or untapped site in Azjan, Barl Syrnac, Lhugdalf or Ukal Sej if the influence check is greater than 8.
